name: Tap Ants: Pop Game Ant Smasher
name_original: Tap Ants: Pop Game Ant Smasher
description:
Tap Ants: Pop Game Ant Smasher is Brand New version Game, Enjoy this Amazing game, Tap the ants to kill them, before they leave the screen, If are you fast enough to protect the food from insects attack?
This is a Free, easy and fun to play, endless game, doesn’t tap the Bee! Or they will explode and ruin your game.

Ant Blast is highly fun loving game for kids, boys and girls. Special virtual goods that make the game easier for young players can be acquired! It's so addicting! Experience this killer bug invasion!
